idx, setup_th, mem_no, setup_title, DATE_FORMAT(join_date,'%Y-%m') as join_date, join_ok, delete_yn, update_date , lang_name1, lang_point1, lang_lv1, lang_lic_name1, lang_lic_num1, lang_get1, lang_talk1, lang_make1, lang_read1, lang_name2, lang_point2, lang_lv2 , lang_lic_name2, lang_lic_num2, lang_get2, lang_talk2, lang_make2, lang_read2, lang_name3, lang_point3, lang_lv3, lang_lic_name3, lang_lic_num3, lang_get3 , lang_talk3, lang_make3, lang_read3 , sw_name1, sw_lv1, sw_name2, sw_lv2, sw_name3, sw_lv3 , lic_name1, lic_num1, lic_get_date1, lic_pub1, lic_name2, lic_num2, lic_get_date2, lic_pub2, lic_name3, lic_num3, lic_get_date3 , lic_pub3, lic_name4, lic_num4, lic_get_date4, lic_pub4 , medal_name1, medal_date1, medal_content1, medal_name2, medal_date2, medal_content2, medal_name3, medal_date3, medal_content3 , for_state1, for_s_date1, for_e_date1, for_name1, for_content1, for_state2, for_s_date2, for_e_date2, for_name2, for_content2 , lang_count, sw_count, lic_count, medal_count, for_count

idx, setup_th, mem_no, setup_title, DATE_FORMAT(join_date,'%Y-%m') as join_date, join_ok, delete_yn, update_date , intern_name, intern_ing, intern_s_date, intern_e_date, intern_duty , his_count, his_co_name1, his_ing1, his_s_date1, his_e_date1, his_content1, his_duty1, his_pay1, his_co_name2, his_ing2, his_s_date2 , his_e_date2, his_content2, his_duty2, his_pay2, his_co_name3, his_ing3, his_s_date3, his_e_date3, his_content3, his_duty3, his_pay3 , port_file, port_url

idx, setup_th, mem_no, setup_title, DATE_FORMAT(join_date,'%Y-%m') as join_date, join_ok, delete_yn, update_date , IFNULL(introduce1, "") as introduce1, IFNULL(introduce2, "") as introduce2, IFNULL(introduce3, "") as introduce3 , IFNULL(introduce4, "") as introduce4, IFNULL(introduce5, "") as introduce5, IFNULL(introduce6, "") as introduce6
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx} and mem_no= #{memNo}

SELECT
FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx} and mem_no= #{memNo}

SELECT
FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx} and mem_no= #{memNo}

SELECT
FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx} and mem_no= #{memNo}

SELECT
FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx} and mem_no= #{memNo}
SELECT idx, setup_th, setup_title, submit_ok, DATE_FORMAT(submit_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as submit_date FROM R_Recruit WHERE idx = #{idx}

SELECT idx, setup_th, setup_title, DATE_FORMAT(se.s_startdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as s_startdate, DATE_FORMAT(se.s_enddate,'%Y-%m-%d') as s_enddate, DATEDIFF(NOW(), s_enddate) as s_dday, CASE WHEN submit_date IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE DATE_FORMAT(submit_date,'%Y-%m-%d') END as submit_date , join_ok, submit_ok, join_company1, join_company2, join_field1, join_area1, join_field2, join_area2, mem_no , sex, name_han, name_eng, photo, zip1, addr11, addr12, bohun, bohun_no, handicap, religoin, ability, hobby , fam_count, fam_con1, fam_name1, fam_age1 , fam_con2, fam_name2, fam_age2, fam_con3, fam_name3, fam_age3, fam_con4, fam_name4, fam_age4 , mil_class, mil_reason, mil_type, mil_lv, mil_arm, mil_ticket, mil_s_date, mil_e_date, last_academy , sch_grad1, sch_enter_ym1, sch_grad_ym1, sch_name1, sch_admis1, sch_major1, sch_site1, sch_night1, sch_point_evg1 , sch_grad2, sch_enter_ym2, sch_grad_ym2, sch_name2, sch_admis2, sch_major2, sch_site2, sch_night2, sch_point_evg2 , sch_grad3, sch_enter_ym3, sch_grad_ym3, sch_name3, sch_admis3, sch_major3, sch_site3, sch_night3, sch_point_evg3, sch_transfer3 , sch_grad4, sch_enter_ym4, sch_grad_ym4, sch_name4, sch_admis4, sch_major4, sch_site4, sch_night4, sch_point_evg4 , sch_grad5, sch_enter_ym5, sch_grad_ym5, sch_name5, sch_admis5, sch_major5, sch_site5, sch_night5, sch_point_evg5 , sch_dep_type2, sch_dep_type3, sch_dep_type4, sch_dep_type5, sch_transfer3 , sch_sub_admis3, sch_sub_major3, sch_sub_point_evg3 , lang_name1, lang_point1, lang_lv1, lang_lic_name1, lang_lic_num1, lang_get1, lang_talk1, lang_make1, lang_read1, lang_name2, lang_point2, lang_lv2 , lang_lic_name2, lang_lic_num2, lang_get2, lang_talk2, lang_make2, lang_read2, lang_name3, lang_point3, lang_lv3, lang_lic_name3, lang_lic_num3, lang_get3, lang_talk3 , lang_make3, lang_read3 , sw_name1, sw_lv1, sw_name2, sw_lv2, sw_name3, sw_lv3 , lic_name1, lic_num1, lic_get_date1, lic_pub1, lic_name2, lic_num2, lic_get_date2, lic_pub2, lic_name3, lic_num3, lic_get_date3 , lic_pub3, lic_name4, lic_num4, lic_get_date4, lic_pub4 , medal_name1, medal_date1, medal_content1, medal_name2, medal_date2, medal_content2, medal_name3, medal_date3, medal_content3 , for_state1, for_s_date1, for_e_date1, for_name1, for_content1, for_state2, for_s_date2, for_e_date2, for_name2, for_content2 , lang_count, sw_count, lic_count, medal_count, for_count , intern_name, intern_ing, intern_s_date, intern_e_date, intern_duty , his_count, his_co_name1, his_ing1, his_s_date1, his_e_date1, his_content1, his_duty1, his_pay1, his_co_name2, his_ing2, his_s_date2 , his_e_date2, his_content2, his_duty2, his_pay2, his_co_name3, his_ing3, his_s_date3, his_e_date3, his_content3, his_duty3, his_pay3 , port_file, port_url , IFNULL(introduce1, "") as introduce1, IFNULL(introduce2, "") as introduce2, IFNULL(introduce3, "") as introduce3 , IFNULL(introduce4, "") as introduce4, IFNULL(introduce5, "") as introduce5, IFNULL(introduce6, "") as introduce6 FROM R_Recruit re LEFT OUTER JOIN R_Setup se ON re.setup_th = se.s_th WHERE idx= #{idx}

SELECT idx, setup_th, setup_title, se.s_startdate as s_startdate, se.s_enddate as s_enddate, DATEDIFF(NOW(), s_enddate) as s_dday, CASE WHEN submit_date IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE DATE_FORMAT(submit_date,'%Y-%m-%d') END as submit_date , join_ok, submit_ok, join_company1, join_company2, join_field1, join_area1, join_field2, join_area2, mem_no , sex, name_han, name_eng, photo, zip1, addr11, addr12, bohun, bohun_no, handicap, religoin, ability, hobby , fam_count, fam_con1, fam_name1, fam_age1 , fam_con2, fam_name2, fam_age2, fam_con3, fam_name3, fam_age3, fam_con4, fam_name4, fam_age4 , mil_class, mil_reason, mil_type, mil_lv, mil_arm, mil_ticket, mil_s_date, mil_e_date, last_academy , sch_grad1, sch_enter_ym1, sch_grad_ym1, sch_name1, sch_admis1, sch_major1, sch_site1, sch_night1, sch_point_evg1 , sch_grad2, sch_enter_ym2, sch_grad_ym2, sch_name2, sch_admis2, sch_major2, sch_site2, sch_night2, sch_point_evg2 , sch_grad3, sch_enter_ym3, sch_grad_ym3, sch_name3, sch_admis3, sch_major3, sch_site3, sch_night3, sch_point_evg3, sch_transfer3 , sch_grad4, sch_enter_ym4, sch_grad_ym4, sch_name4, sch_admis4, sch_major4, sch_site4, sch_night4, sch_point_evg4 , sch_grad5, sch_enter_ym5, sch_grad_ym5, sch_name5, sch_admis5, sch_major5, sch_site5, sch_night5, sch_point_evg5 , sch_dep_type2, sch_dep_type3, sch_dep_type4, sch_dep_type5, sch_transfer3 , sch_sub_admis3, sch_sub_major3, sch_sub_point_evg3 , lang_name1, lang_point1, lang_lv1, lang_lic_name1, lang_lic_num1, lang_get1, lang_talk1, lang_make1, lang_read1, lang_name2, lang_point2, lang_lv2 , lang_lic_name2, lang_lic_num2, lang_get2, lang_talk2, lang_make2, lang_read2, lang_name3, lang_point3, lang_lv3, lang_lic_name3, lang_lic_num3, lang_get3, lang_talk3 , lang_make3, lang_read3 , sw_name1, sw_lv1, sw_name2, sw_lv2, sw_name3, sw_lv3 , lic_name1, lic_num1, lic_get_date1, lic_pub1, lic_name2, lic_num2, lic_get_date2, lic_pub2, lic_name3, lic_num3, lic_get_date3 , lic_pub3, lic_name4, lic_num4, lic_get_date4, lic_pub4 , medal_name1, medal_date1, medal_content1, medal_name2, medal_date2, medal_content2, medal_name3, medal_date3, medal_content3 , for_state1, for_s_date1, for_e_date1, for_name1, for_content1, for_state2, for_s_date2, for_e_date2, for_name2, for_content2 , lang_count, sw_count, lic_count, medal_count, for_count , intern_name, intern_ing, intern_s_date, intern_e_date, intern_duty , his_count, his_co_name1, his_ing1, his_s_date1, his_e_date1, his_content1, his_duty1, his_pay1, his_co_name2, his_ing2, his_s_date2 , his_e_date2, his_content2, his_duty2, his_pay2, his_co_name3, his_ing3, his_s_date3, his_e_date3, his_content3, his_duty3, his_pay3 , port_file, port_url , IFNULL(introduce1, "") as introduce1, IFNULL(introduce2, "") as introduce2, IFNULL(introduce3, "") as introduce3 , IFNULL(introduce4, "") as introduce4, IFNULL(introduce5, "") as introduce5, IFNULL(introduce6, "") as introduce6 FROM R_Recruit re LEFT OUTER JOIN R_Setup se ON re.setup_th = se.s_th WHERE mem_no= #{memNo} ORDER BY join_DATE DESC

SELECT re.idx, re.setup_title, DATE_FORMAT(re.join_date,'%Y-%m') as join_date, re.join_ok, re.submit_ok, DATE_FORMAT(se.s_enddate,'%Y.%m.%d') as setup_date FROM R_Recruit as re INNER JOIN R_Setup as se ON re.setup_th = se.s_th WHERE se.s_enddate <= NOW() AND re.mem_no= #{memNo} ORDER BY re.join_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM R_Recruit WHERE mem_no= #{memNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM R_Recruit WHERE mem_no= #{memNo} and setup_th = #{sTh}
SELECT count(idx) FROM R_Recruit WHERE mem_no= #{memNo} and setup_th = #{sTh}
SELECT idx FROM R_Recruit WHERE mem_no= #{memNo} and setup_th = #{sTh}
